original: A powerful pneumatic arrow thrower handcrafted from scrap. Powerful and accurate to a long range, but surprising loud, and it takes a long time to pump up to full pressure.
translation: 一把强有力的气动式箭矢发射器，利用废土上随处可见的废料与你创造性思维纯手工制成。精确而又不失威力，但发射后的动静出乎却意料的大，而且要花费很长时间才能泵到高压状态。
context:
ID: pneu_sniper
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Weapons/Pneumatics.json
类型为 GUN

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUN→pneu_sniper
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=pneu_sniper

original: A precision machined superalloy riser, with enough dials to tune it to your exact liking. It even has cool engravings, and feels surprisingly warm and comfortable in your hand.
translation: 一把采用精密加工的超合金弓身，有划分细致的刻度盘，可根据你的个人使用习惯或喜好随时调整力度。上面甚至还有充满科幻感的浮纹，当你握在手中时感觉爱不释手，仿佛为你量身打造一般。
context:
ID: bow_powerriser
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Attachments.json
类型为 GUNMOD

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUNMOD→bow_powerriser
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=bow_powerriser

original: A set of competition-grade composite replacement bow and crossbow limbs, to squeeze out some extra energy during your draw. It even has a super-cool decal running down the limbs.
translation: 一套使用复合材料制成的竞赛级替换用弓及弩臂，人体工程学的设计使其在拉动时能让你省些力气。在上面甚至还有个超酷的印花。
context:
ID: bow_powerlimbs
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Attachments.json
类型为 GUNMOD

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUNMOD→bow_powerlimbs
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=bow_powerlimbs

original: A set of finely tuned internal components which increase the precision and reliably of a firearm.
translation: 通过微调枪械内部组件从而增加其精度和可靠的一套组件。
context:
ID: tuned_mechanism
位于 /Kenan-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Attachments.json
类型为 GUNMOD

original: A set of precision machined shaped cams, with a dial to tune it to your exact draw. The spokes even make a cool pattern.
translation: 一套精密加工成型的凸轮，带刻度盘，可根据你的需求进行精细调整。辐条上甚至有个挺酷的图案。
context:
ID: bow_powercams
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Attachments.json
类型为 GUNMOD

original: A sharp bolt made from steel and dipped in an incendiary powder. Goes off on impact.
translation: 一根钢制弩矢，尖端附有燃烧性粉末。命中后会引起小型爆炸。
context:
ID: bolt_steel_inc
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Ammo/Bolts.json
类型为 AMMO

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→AMMO→bolt_steel_inc
物品浏览器：

original: A strong and precise polymer string for a bow or crossbow. Helps to keep the bow constant, and retain as much energy as possible. Oddly enough, it's even your favourite color!
translation: 一根由聚合物制成富有弹性而坚固的弦，能用于弓或弩上。有助于保持拉弓上弦时的稳定性，并尽可能多的储存弹性势能。好巧不巧，它的颜色甚至是你最喜欢的内个，好耶！
context:
ID: bow_powerstring
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Attachments.json
类型为 GUNMOD

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUNMOD→bow_powerstring
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=bow_powerstring

original: A top-of-the-line pneumatic arrow launcher. Silent and deadly, designed for hunting, but splits zombie skulls just as easily. Holding three standard arrows and enough compressed air for each, the Airbower is versatile and powerful. Activate to turn off the internal air compressor, which is currently helping you to reload faster at the cost of some power and noise.
translation: 一把顶级的气动箭矢发射器。无声且致命，专为狩猎而生，但击碎丧尸头骨也非常容易。内设三个活动箭矢槽，由用途广阔的强大压缩空气作为动力源。启动中的内置空压机可有助于让你更快的装填箭矢，但代价是额外的噪声与消耗中的电量。
context:
ID: airbower_succ
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Weapons/Pneumatics.json
类型为 GUN

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUN→airbower_succ
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=airbower_succ

original: A top-of-the-line pneumatic arrow launcher. Silent and deadly, designed for hunting, but splits zombie skulls just as easily. Holding three standard arrows and enough compressed air for each, the Airbower is versatile and powerful. Activate to turn on the internal air compressor and reload faster at the cost of some power and noise.
translation: 一把顶级的气动箭矢发射器。无声且致命，专为狩猎而生，但击碎丧尸头骨也非常容易。内设三个活动箭矢槽，由用途广阔的强大压缩空气作为动力源。激活以启用内置空压机，用耗电和额外的噪声作为代价让你更快的装填箭矢。
context:
ID: airbower
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Weapons/Pneumatics.json
类型为 GUN

ID: a22_bolter
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Weapons/Pneumatics.json
类型为 GUN

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUN→a22_bolter
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=a22_bolter

original: An experimental, military-grade bolt launcher designed by Aerial Labs for spec ops teams, when stealth and versatility is required. As powerful as it is sleek, this short rifle accepts standard crossbow bolts and spits them out with power and accuracy, even at full auto. A combined air compressor and magnetic rails propel the bolts at high speed, but give this a fairly substantial energy cost. Unfortunately, the bulky ammunition and integral magazine made it fairly unwieldy, and it never really left the prototype stage.
translation: 一把由空气动力学实验室专为特种作战小组定制的实验性军用级弩矢发射器，拥有微声及多功能性。外形小巧玲珑却不失其强大威力，使用标准规格的弩矢供弹，即便在全自动模式下也精确有力。组合式空压机与磁轨离心器的设计得以将弩矢从膛室中转能飞速射向目标，极具杀伤力。但这一切的前提是需要相当可观能量储备来供使用。且不幸的是，笨重的弹药和一体化弹仓在装填中相当不便，它从未真正离开原型阶段。
context:
ID: a22_bolter
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Weapons/Pneumatics.json
类型为 GUN

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→GUN→a22_bolter
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=a22_bolter

translation: 添加了几个的弓弩式的气动武器。

original: This experimental arrow is equipped with active stabilization and targeting systems for perfect accuracy, even when hitting small or moving targets. While only decently damaging, this arrow was designed for special forces when stealth is necessary. A simple teleport system even returns the arrow to the user after firing.
translation: 这支高科技实验型箭矢配备了主动稳定与瞄准系统，即使目标微小或正在移动也能达到完美的精度。专供特种部队使用，虽然伤害在功能性上做出了让步，但无声即隐形在渗透中是非常有必要的。一个简单而又不凡的浮空定位系统甚至能在箭矢射出后回到使用者身边，就差你吹吹口哨了。
context:
ID: smart_arrow
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version/Ammo/Arrows.json
类型为 AMMO

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Expanded_Archery_Temp_Lite_Version→AMMO→smart_arrow
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=smart_arrow

translation: 这支金属箭的箭头被替换成了一个微型电磁脉冲发生器。一次性用品，无法回收，可别打偏了。
